name: Thirty One
summary:
Thirty One! is a strategy-based card game, also known as big tonka, scat, blitz and cadillac. The game is easy to learn, yet with endless fun.
You play against 3 computer controlled opponents. Your goal is to have 31 points in each game. You will have hours of fun trying to out smart them by getting a blitz (a hand of exactly 31 points)!
